goal: Improve strength and mobility in your fingers and shoulder
precaution: If you feel pain, fatigue, or dizziness, please tell the system so that we can terminate the exercise for your safety.
instruction: 1. Place both your hands on the table.
2. Tap your fingers on the table as a warm-up.
3. With your right hand, reach into a bowl and pick up a bean.
4. Drop the bean back into the bowl.
5. Pick up each bean with your right hand.
6. Move the bean to the bowl on your left side.
7. Release the bean and put it in the bowl.
8. Go back and get another bean with your right hand.
9. Move the next bean to the bowl on your left side.
10. Release the next bean and put it in the bowl.
11. Repeat steps 8 to 10 until no beans are left in the original bowl.
